p: Predominant radiologic pattern in patients with hMPV infection and without coinfection was the interstitial alveolar pattern (47.6%), while in the patients with Streptococcus pneumoniae coinfection, the alveolar pattern was predominant (85.7%). Eight patients had pleural effusion at admission, and two more developed it during the ICU stay. Pleural effusion was bilateral in four patients and massive (> 2 L) in three cases.
